prompt_output: 一张农田的垂直遥感图像，显示了广阔的农业区域，其中包含多个深绿色矩形地块，这些地块被米色或浅棕色的直线道路划分。部分农田地块呈现出明显的平行种植行纹理。图像中散布着少数建筑物和结构。在图像的右上角，可见一片浅蓝色覆盖物旁的建筑物。图像中心偏右处，沿着一条垂直的道路，有一组建筑群，其中包含一栋深色屋顶建筑和一栋带有红色屋顶的较小建筑。图像的左下角，沿着一条水平道路，分布着数个结构和裸露的土地区域。图像的右下角，接近道路交汇处，也可见一些建筑物，包括一个带有蓝色覆盖物和一个带有红色屋顶的结构。

An overhead satellite image depicts an organized agricultural landscape primarily composed of large rectangular fields intersected by a network of unpaved dirt roads. The fields display variations in vegetation, with most covered in dark green crops showing distinct linear planting rows. Some fields exhibit lighter green or light brown/beige tones, potentially indicating different crop types, growth stages, or bare soil. In the lower central part of the image, a small settlement or farmstead is visible, featuring several light-roofed buildings situated next to a long, dark blue or black rectangular feature, possibly a pond or a specialized agricultural structure. A smaller, distinct blue rectangular object is also present in the upper central portion of the image, likely another isolated building or facility.

An aerial view of an agricultural landscape featuring a large, central rectangular field of brown, tilled soil with visible linear patterns. This field is bordered by dark green cultivated land or dense vegetation on its left, top, and right sides. A light-colored, L-shaped dirt road or path runs along the bottom and right edges of the large brown field, separating it from additional dark green fields in the lower-right quadrant. In the top-left corner, a small cluster of buildings with light-colored rooftops is visible, surrounded by a mix of bare earth and dark green trees, indicating a small rural settlement or farmstead. Smaller dark green rectangular plots are also visible in the bottom-left and top-right sections of the image.

An overhead satellite image depicts an agricultural landscape divided by a horizontal dirt path. The upper section features several large fields characterized by parallel, vertical strips of dark green vegetation, indicating organized cultivation. The lower section includes a light brown, possibly tilled field on the left, which contains a dark, C-shaped feature that appears to be agricultural equipment or its shadow. To the right of this tilled area, additional fields with vertical strips of varying shades of green and brown are present, consistent with cultivated land.

An overhead satellite image depicts a rural agricultural landscape characterized by large, rectangular crop fields displaying a dark green to bluish-green hue, with visible parallel cultivation rows. These fields are crisscrossed and segmented by light-colored unpaved roads, forming a distinct grid pattern. In the upper right portion of the image, a small cluster of structures with varied roof colors, including blue and orange, is situated alongside a dirt road. Another smaller group of buildings is present in the lower right, featuring a prominent structure with a blue roof and an adjacent light-colored, rectangular ground feature. The upper left area contains a field of bare, light brown earth, contrasting with the verdant cultivated areas.

An aerial image depicts an agricultural landscape featuring diverse field conditions and a central farmstead. A prominent unpaved dirt road traverses horizontally across the middle of the image. North of this road and positioned slightly to the left of the center, a cluster of buildings with a distinct red roof and a smaller blue structure is visible, surrounded by several green trees. The land immediately north of the road and around the buildings consists primarily of brown, tilled fields with visible parallel furrows running vertically. South of the road, the landscape is divided vertically. The western portion features a dark green, densely cultivated field with clear vertical rows, indicating active plant growth. The eastern portion south of the road consists of a brown, tilled field with vertical furrows, similar to the fields north of the road. The overall scene shows a mix of actively cultivated and fallow or recently harvested agricultural plots.

An aerial image displays an agricultural landscape with a mix of cultivated fields, farm structures, and unpaved roads. In the upper part, there are two large rectangular fields, one with dark green parallel crop rows and another with light brown parallel lines suggesting tilled soil or harvested land. A prominent unpaved dirt road runs horizontally across the image's center, separating the upper and lower sections of fields. In the lower part, a large field on the right exhibits light brown parallel lines. To its left, a field features dark green parallel crop rows. On the far left, a cluster of several large, rectangular buildings with bright blue roofs are arranged in an organized manner, likely agricultural facilities such as greenhouses. A smaller, single-story building with a light-colored roof is situated in the bottom-center, surrounded by dense green vegetation. Sparse trees and vegetation line some field edges and surround the structures. The fields show distinct patterns of cultivation and land preparation.

An overhead satellite image depicts a rural landscape characterized by a mix of agricultural fields and a small settlement. In the upper right portion, a cluster of buildings is visible, featuring structures with light grey, blue, and a prominent red roof. Extending from this built-up area and throughout the lower and left quadrants are numerous irregularly shaped agricultural fields, showing various shades of green, indicating cultivated crops, interspersed with patches of brown bare earth. A network of unpaved roads and pathways traverses the scene, connecting the different agricultural parcels and leading into the settlement. Scattered trees and natural vegetation are also present, particularly around the buildings and along some field edges.
